3: The last infected body in front of you also falls under Lee's gun.
It's safe now. Let's look for clues.
You reconvene after investigating for quite some time.
I didn't find any clues. Anything that matched the search criteria turned up useless.
Such as a record of Roland sitting on the roof or Gabriel passing by on the street.
Some Constructs fought with the Ascendants here, but by the look of them... the record is pretty old.
I found another record on the farewell letter. They came back here sometime after for a short while.
Looks like they really did find something.
Can you tell what it is from the look of their luggage?
No. It was just an automated suitcase.
We still don't have enough clues. Let's continue searching, Commandant.
